data.title: Canary Islands Physical Supply Port
data.meta_description: The Canary Islands ports provide a convenient supply option for vessels trading between Europe, Africa and the Americas. Peninsula has been an active physical supplier since 1998 and is able to supply vessels across...
data.text:
The Canary Islands ports provide a convenient supply option for vessels trading between Europe, Africa and the Americas.

Peninsula has been an active physical supplier since 1998 and is able to supply vessels across Las Palmas,Santa Cruz de Tenerife and Granadilla. Deliveries can be arranged either by ex-pipe or by barge. The presence of a ship agency and underwater services business in the Canaries completes Peninsulaâ€™s maritime services offering and a local team of experienced traders also offer advice on port optionality and delivery method as well as providing a reselling service into African ports.
